Common.description: Reclaim control of your time through enforced intervention and visual reflection. A tool for "refusal" and "awareness".

ZenQuotes.text: Very little is needed to make a happy life; it is all within yourself, in your way of thinking.
ZenQuotes.author: Marcus Aurelius

ZenQuotes.text: Waste no more time arguing about what a good man should be. Be one.
ZenQuotes.author: Marcus Aurelius

ZenQuotes.text: The happiness of your life depends upon the quality of your thoughts.
ZenQuotes.author: Marcus Aurelius

ZenQuotes.text: Dwell on the beauty of life. Watch the stars, and see yourself running with them.
ZenQuotes.author: Marcus Aurelius

ZenQuotes.text: Accept the things to which fate binds you, and love the people with whom fate brings you together, but do so with all your heart.
ZenQuotes.author: Marcus Aurelius
